marklogic.body: Stop listening to Zimmerman's father. He wasn't there folks. Zimmerman wasn't touched and that's apparent. If you cannot see or hear that doesn't mean no one else can. Police are not doctors and cannot diagnose a broken nose. Physicians diagnose fracture nasal facial bones based on x-rays. None we taken, he saw no doctor A broken nose causes pooling of internal Bleeding below the eyes. A broken nose Bleeds profusely. He did not go to the emergency room. He is a racist coward and the Sanford Police Department is in deep for peddling lies. They all thought the kid was a thug and no one would notice and covered everything up...no forensics (except from Martin), no crimes scene cordoned Off. Now the world knows the truth from here to the ends of the earth. A young man was murdered by a racist coward.
